title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Thursday Night showdown between the Chiefs and the Chargers and why the Chargers look like the better team despite losing the game. He does like what he's seen from Patrick Mahomes so far this season after losing Tyreek Hill and elevating the Chiefs offense. He gives you his Blazing 5 picks for week 2 of the NFL season. Plus, NFL on Fox analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show in studio to talk about the Giants surprising win over the Titans and what to expect from the Rams after getting dominated by the Bills in week 1. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
